name.description: The name of the Soldermask. Use the official name or some name as close to it as possible

ipc_sm_840_class.description: Soldermask to meet IPC SM 840 Class.

link.description: The link to some url that gives more information or a reference to the product.

accept_equivalent.description: Equivalent material to the one specified is OK to use as a replacement if true.

name.description: The name of the Laminate. Use the official name or some name as close to it as possible.

ipc_4101_sheet.description: The reference sheet number of the IPC 4101 Standard.

ipc_4103_sheet.description: The reference sheet number of the IPC 4103 Standard.

ipc_4204_sheet.description: The reference sheet number of the IPC 4204 Standard.

tg_min.description: The minimum Glass Transition Temperature (Tg) required.

tg_range_from.description: The Glass Transition Temperature (Tg) range starts at.

tg_range_to.description: The Glass Transition Temperature (Tg) range ands at.

td_min.description: The minimum required temperature at which a base laminate material experiences an established percentage of weight loss using Thermograv imetric Analysis (TGA).

halogen_free.description: Indicates the material is material free or is required to be

link.description: The link to some url that gives more information or a reference to the product.

accept_equivalent.description: Equivalent material to the one specified is OK to use as a replacement if true.

descriptive_name.description: The name of the stiffener. Use the official name or some name as close to it as possible

link.description: The link to some url that gives more information or a reference to the product.

accept_equivalent.description: Equivalent material to the one specified is OK to use as a replacement if true.

stiffeners.description: The materials to be used as stiffener

enum_description.free: The manufacturer can choose the stackup that matches the rest of the requirements
enum_description.separate_file: A file is supplied with the package that will contain the actual stackup
enum_description.specified: The actual stackup is under the stackup->specified element

specification_level.description: The stack up of this board

file_name.description: The URI of the file that specifies the stackup. Either as a path witin a project compressed file (ZIP) or as a link

minimum_internal_track_width.description: The minimum nominal width of conductors on internal/unplated layers (minimum track).

minimum_external_track_width.description: The minimum nominal width of conductors on external/plated layers (minimum track). If only only one minimum track is present, is should be here.

minimum_internal_spacing_width.description: The minimum gap between two conductors on the internal layers.

minimum_external_spacing_width.description: The minimum gap between two conductors on the external layers. If only one minimum gap is present, is should be here.

external_base_copper_thickness.description: Finished base copper thickness following IPC Class on the up to two external layers

internal_base_copper_thickness.description: Finished base copper thickness following IPC Class on the internal layers

copper_foil_roughness.description: The roughness of the copper foil

copper_coverage_average.description: The average copper coverage of the board

name.description: The name of the Laminate. Use the official name or some name as close to it as possible

ipc_4101_sheet.description: The reference sheet number of the IPC 4101 Standard

ipc_4103_sheet.description: The reference sheet number of the IPC 4103 Standard

ipc_4204_sheet.description: The reference sheet number of the IPC 4204 Standard

tg_min.description: The minimum Glass Transition Temperature (Tg) required

tg_range_from.description: The Glass Transition Temperature (Tg) range starts at

tg_range_to.description: The Glass Transition Temperature (Tg) range ands at

td_min.description: The minimum required temperature at which a base laminate material experiences an established percentage of weight loss using Thermograv imetric Analysis (TGA)

halogen_free.description: Indicates the material is material free or is required to be

link.description: The link to some url that gives more information or a reference to the product

accept_equivalent.description: Equivalent material to the one specified is OK to use as a replacement if true

enum_description.none: No final finish should be used
enum_description.g: ASTM-B-488 Gold for edge printed board connectors and areas not to be soldered
enum_description.GS: J-STD-003 Gold Electroplate on areas to be soldered
enum_description.gwb-1_ultrasonic: ASTM-B-488 Gold Electroplate for areas to be wire bonded (ultrasonic)
enum_description.gwb-2-thermosonic: ASTM-B-488 Gold Electroplate for areas to be wire bonded (thermosonic)
enum_description.s_hasl: J-STD-003_J-STD-006 Solder Coating over Bare Copper (HASL)
enum_description.b1_lfhasl: J-STD-003_J-STD-006 Lead-Free Solder Coating over Bare Copper (Lead-Free HASL, Lead free HASL)

finish.description: The material/method/surface to be used in the finish

area.description: The area that the finish will cover

color.description: This describes the color based on the name of the color; green, black, blue, red, white, yellow. If a specific color needs to be defined, this can be done custom -> colors section

material.description: The name of a material that appears in the materials section

allow_touchups.description: The manufacturer is allowed to do touchups on the soldermask if true

color.description: This describes the color based on the name of the color; white, yellow. If a specific color needs to be defined, this can be done custom -> colors section

size.description: The size of the stiffener should be specified in drawing

enum_description.top: The stiffener is on top of the flexible layer(s)
enum_description.bottom: The stiffener is below the flexible layer(s)

placement.description: Indicating if the stiffener is on top or bottom of the flexible layer

material.description: The name of a material that appears in the materials section

total_thickness.description: The total thickness of the coverlay

material.description: The name of a material that appears in the materials -> soldermask section

accept_equivalent.description: If alternative to DuPont™ Kapton® HN general-purpose film can be used

type_of_bag.description: The material of the bag to be used

hic.description: True to include a Humidity Indicator Card (HIC), False to not

esd.description: True to indicate that packaging for ESD-sensitive required

desiccant.description: True to indicate that a desiccant material is required

vacuum.description: True to indicate that vacuum is needed for shrinkage - no heat rap or shrink rap allowed

type_1.description: A via with a dry film mask material applied bridging over the via wherein no additional materials are in the hole

type_2.description: A Type I via with a secondary covering of mask material applied over the tented via

type_3.description: A via with material applied allowing partial penetration into the via. The plug material may be applied from one or both sides

type_4a.description: A Type III via with a secondary covering of material applied over the via. The plug material may be applied from one or both sides

type_4b.description: A Type III via with a secondary covering of material applied over the via. The plug material may be applied from one or both sides

type_5.description: A via with material applied into the via targeting a full penetration and encapsulation of the hole

type_6a.description: A Type V via with a secondary covering of material (liquid or dry film soldermask) applied over the via. The plug material may be applied from one or both sides

type_6b.description: A Type V via with a secondary covering of material (liquid or dry film soldermask) applied over the via. The plug material may be applied from one or both sides

type_7.description: A Type V via with a secondary metallized coating covering the via. The metallization is on both sides

size_x.description: The size of the board in the x-asis

size_y.description: The size of the board in the y-asis

size_x.description: The size of the array in the x-asis

size_y.description: The size of the array in the y-asis

boards_x.description: Number of boards in the panel in the x-direction

boards_y.description: Number of boards in the panel in the y-direction

boards_total.description: Number total number of boards in the panel. This is not the preferred method of stating the number, "boards_x" and "boards_y" should be used

border_left.description: The size of the left side boarder between the edge and the board

border_right.description: The size of the right side boarder between the edge and the board

border_top.description: The size of the top side boarder between the edge and the board

border_bottom.description: The size of the bottom side boarder between the edge and the board

board_spacing_x.description: The size of the space between the boards in the x-direction

board_spacing_y.description: The size of the space between the boards in the y-direction

fiducials_number.description: The number of fiducials on the array

breakaway_method.description: The method of creation of the breakaways on the array

mouse_bites.description: Indicates if there should be "mouse bites" to allow easy break away of the boards

tooling_holes_number.description: The number of tooling holes on the array

tooling_holes_size.description: The size of the tooling holes.

x_outs_allowed.description: Manufacturer can deliver arrays with defect boards as long as these are clearly marked as defect (X'ed out).

x_outs_max_percentage_on_array.description: The maximum number of defective and clearly marked as such boards that are allowed on on panel, stated in percentage

transplant_board_allowed.description: The maximum number of defective and clearly marked as such boards that are allowed on on panel, stated in percentage.

depth_routing_top.description: Depth Routing from the top present

depth_routing_bottom.description: Depth Routing from the bottom present

layers.description: The layers included in the connectors, counted from 1 (top layer)

enum_description.other: To be specified in the thickness_other tag

thickness_other.description: Thickness if it is not "0.76" or "1.27".

area.description: Area covered by the edge connectors in square desimeter

layers.description: The layers included in the connectors, counter from 1 (top layer)

date_code.description: Possible values are "YY" for year, "WW" for week "-" and "LOT" (alias "BATCH"). E.g. "YYWW-LOT" or "LOT-YYWW". If no marking, set "NONE"

standards.description: Possible values are the ones listed in the subelement "standards" but typical will be "ul" and "rohs"

serial_number.description: Serial number should be added in the markings

serial_number_format.description: Format of the serial number expressed as a "regular expression" but needs to have x amount of digits in it

serial_number_start.description: The number to start the serial number from. Will have to replace the digits from the "serial_number_format" above

serial_number_increase_by.description: The increase in number from "serial_number_start" with each product

ul.description: Indicating if UL is required for the board. Can not be used as a capability, as this will be indicated on each material

c_ul.description: Indicating if Canadian UL is required for the board. Can not be used as a capability, as this will be indicated on each material

enum_description.hb: HB - Slow burning on a horizontal specimen; burning rate < 76 mm/min for thickness < 3 mm or burning stops before 100 mm
enum_description.v_0: V-0 - Burning stops within 30 seconds on a vertical specimen; drips of flaming particles are allowed
enum_description.v_1: V-1 - Burning stops within 30 seconds on a vertical specimen; drips of particles allowed as long as they are not inflamed
enum_description.v_2: V-2 - Burning stops within 30 seconds on a vertical specimen; drips of flaming particles are allowed
enum_description.5vb: 5VB - Burning stops within 60 seconds on a vertical specimen; no drips allowed; plaque specimens may develop a hole
enum_description.5va: 5VA - Burning stops within 60 seconds on a vertical specimen; no drips allowed; plaque specimens may not develop a hole

ul94.description: UL 94 - Standard for Safety of Flammability of Plastic Materials for Parts in Devices and Appliances testing

enum_description.aabus: As Agreed Between User and Supplier

ipc_6010_copper_plating_thickness_level.description: Used either if ipc_6010_class is set to 2 and you want to add copper plating thickness demands from class 3, or the other way round - class 3 is set but you can accept demands from class 2

ipc_6010_annular_ring_level.description: Used either if ipc_6010_class is set to 2 and you want to add annular ring demands from class 3, or the other way round - class 3 is set but you can accept demands from class 2

ipc_6010_conductor_spacing_level.description: Used either if ipc_6010_class is set to 2 and you want to add conductor spacing demands from class 3, or the other way round - class 3 is set but you can accept demands from class 2

ipc_6010_conductor_width_level.description: Used either if ipc_6010_class is set to 2 and you want to add conductor width demands from class 3, or the other way round - class 3 is set but you can accept demands from class 2

ipc_6013_class.description: Requirements according to IPC 6013 for flexible or rigid-flex boards

ipc_6018.description: IPC-6018 Microwave End Product Board Inspection and Test

netlist.description: 100% Netlist testing according to IPC-D-356, ODB++ or IPC2581

allow_generate_netlist.description: Allow Netlist to be generated from Gerber or other file format if needed

impedance.description: How to conduct a impedance test

iso_3166_1_alpha_3.description: A three letter string representation of the Country of origin according too ISO 3166-1

iso_3166_1_alpha_2.description: A two letter string representation of the Country of origin according too ISO 3166-1

nato_member.description: Indicates if the COO is a NATO member state

eu_member.description: Indicates if the COO is a European Union member state

number.description: The number of holes total or in this process

plated.description: True if the holes are plated

size.description: The size of the hole in micrometers. Can be considered the minimum hole size if only one holes element present in the list or as a capability

layer_start.description: The layer where the hole starts, counted from the top, where top layer is 1

layer_stop.description: The layer where the hole stops, counted from the top, where top layer is 1

method.description: Can be either "routing" or "drilling", where drilling is default

dead_pad_removal.description: Allowed to remove Non Functioning Pads

add_copper_balancing_on_array.description: Adding copper balancing pattern on array/panel frame allowed

resize_legend.description: Resizing the legend to fit is allowed

any_name.description: Must have a similar element in the custom -> additional
